content: दंतः [दम्-तन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 86</ls>] {@--1@} A tooth, tusk, fang (as of serpents, beasts &c.); वदसि यदि किंचिदपि दंतरुचिकौमुदी हरति दरतिमिरमतिघोरं <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; सर्पदंत, वराह° &c. {@--2@} An elephant's tusk, ivory: °पांचालिका <ls>Māl. 10. 5.</ls> {@--3@} The point of an arrow. {@--4@} The peak of a mountain. {@--5@} The side or ridge of a mountain. {@--6@} The number thirty-two. {@--7@} A bower, an arbour (कुंज).
